welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Belley! Known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's beauty and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chambery Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Annecy-Meythe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Annecy-Meythe Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of St-Exupéry Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
